name: On the Other Side (Rengifs)
description:
On the Other Side (Otos) is a school game.

You must escape from this evil school,  but several paranormal events will prevent you.

Can you survive this adventure that will take you on a journey between two worlds?

Credits:

Achille Pace: Programer, Lead

Tom Mignotte : Programer,  Tech Artist

Jade Roudier-Luque : 3D & 2D Artist 

Léa Marty : 3D & 2D Artist 

Roux Tristan : 3D  Artist
